captions.text:
We must stop dirty language
from getting to
our children's ears !

We must go fight
the source of it !

- But what is the source ?
- Oh, that's easy.

♪ times have changed
our kids are getting worse ♪

♪ they won't obey
their parents ♪

♪ they just want
to fart and curse ♪

♪ should we
blame the government ♪
♪ or blame society ♪

♪ or should we blame
the images on tv ♪

- No !
♪ blame canada ♪
- ♪ blame canada ♪

♪ before their beady
little eyes ♪

♪ have packed their heads
so full of lies ♪

♪ blame canada
blame canada ♪

♪ we need to form
a full assault ♪
♪ it's canada's fault ♪

♪ don't blame me
for my son stan ♪

♪ he saw the darn cartoon
and now he's off
to join the klan ♪

♪ and my boy eric once had
my picture on his shelf ♪

♪ but now when I see him
he tells me to fuck myself ♪

Well ?
♪ blame canada ♪
♪ blame canada ♪

♪ it seems that
everything's gone wrong
since canada came along ♪
♪ blame canada ♪
♪ blame canada ♪

♪ they're not even
a real country anyway ♪

♪ my son could've been a doctor
or a lawyer rich and true ♪

♪ instead he burned up
like a piggy
on a barbecue ♪

-♪ should we blame the matches ♪
-♪ should we blame the fire ♪

♪ or the doctors who
allowed him to expire ♪

Heck, no !
♪ blame canada ♪
♪ blame canada ♪

♪ with all their hockey
hullabaloo ♪

♪ and that bitch
anne murray too ♪

♪ blame canada
shame on canada ♪

♪ for the smut we must stop
the trash we must smash ♪

♪ the laughter and fun
must all be undone ♪

♪ we must blame them
and cause a fuss ♪

♪ before somebody
thinks of blaming us ♪

comments.text:
This is so offensive. Why is everyone against us. Not everything we do is stupid. I'll admit Justin Bieber is irritating, but not all of us. You don't need to judge all of us for giving people stuff to enjoy.
Our country has it's ups and downs. Not all of us do bad stuff. If you don't like us, I kind of understand, but please keep your offensiveness to yourself. It's not needed.

This is why I think the world is lost and doesn't care about helping others. It's really important, people. Don't go against us because of one person. I say we put down our guns, stop fighting, and do something about this negative influence humans in general caused on the world.
comments.author: John Oak

comments.author: crusaderstar01

comments.text:
Oh, yes. Only Americans blame others for their mistakes. Think again. 
Plenty of people in other countries do blame other for their mistakes. 
French parents have blamed Americans for their children getting out of 
control in recent times. In reality, they allowed them to watch violent 
American shows. Non-English countries do air American shows, though they 
have dubbed them over in their languages. Of course, people never say a 
word about bratty children in other countries. They always go after bratty 
American children. It's about time they quit turning a blind eye to bratty 
children in other countries while slamming bratty American children. It's 
so hypocritical.
